meanings.sent1: The mole moved subterraneanly through the tunnel.
meanings.sent2: The ants traveled subterraneanly to their underground nest.
meanings.sent3: The gopher danced subterraneanly, much to the surprise of the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The roots of the tree spread subterraneanly, seeking water and nutrients.
meanings.sent5: The miner explored subterraneanly, discovering hidden caves and passages.

meanings.definition: Below the surface of the earth
meanings.sent1: The subterranean creatures thrive in the dark depths below.
meanings.sent2: The subterranean tunnels provided a safe passage for the explorers.
meanings.sent3: The subterranean city was a marvel of engineering and secrecy.
meanings.sent4: The subterranean river flowed silently beneath the rocky terrain.
meanings.sent5: The subterranean world held mysteries waiting to be uncovered.
